Craftsmanship.name: Documentation
Craftsmanship.description: Quality and accessibility of technical documentation, including architecture decisions, APIs, and system behaviors. Focuses on keeping documentation current, clear, and useful for both new and existing team members.

Craftsmanship.name: Architecture
Craftsmanship.description: Overall system design quality, including scalability, maintainability, and technical debt management. Covers architectural decisions, patterns, and system evolution strategies.

Craftsmanship.name: Testing
Craftsmanship.description: Comprehensive testing practices including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing. Focuses on test coverage, quality, and automation to ensure reliable software delivery.

Craftsmanship.name: Security & Compliance
Craftsmanship.description: Implementation of security best practices, vulnerability management, and compliance requirements. Ensures protection of systems, data, and adherence to regulatory standards.

Craftsmanship.name: Performance
Craftsmanship.description: System performance optimization, including response times, resource utilization, and scalability. Focuses on maintaining high performance standards and efficient resource usage.

Delivery.name: CI/CD
Delivery.description: Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery pipeline efficiency, including build automation, deployment processes, and release management. Ensures reliable and frequent software delivery.

Delivery.name: Team Commitments
Delivery.description: Team's ability to plan, commit to, and deliver work consistently. Includes sprint planning, estimation accuracy, and delivery predictability.

Delivery.name: Individual Commitments
Delivery.description: Individual team members' ability to manage and deliver their assigned tasks effectively. Focuses on personal accountability and delivery reliability.

Delivery.name: Maintenance
Delivery.description: Ongoing system maintenance practices, including updates, patches, and technical debt management. Ensures long-term system health and reliability.

Delivery.name: Monitoring
Delivery.description: System monitoring and observability practices, including metrics collection, alerting, and incident detection. Ensures proactive issue identification and resolution.

Delivery.name: DORA
Delivery.description: Implementation and tracking of DORA metrics (Deployment Frequency, Lead Time, Change Failure Rate, Time to Restore). Measures and improves development team performance.

Collaboration.name: Feedback
Collaboration.description: Effectiveness of feedback loops within the team and with stakeholders. Includes code reviews, retrospectives, and continuous improvement processes.

Collaboration.name: Onboarding
Collaboration.description: Process and effectiveness of new team member onboarding. Includes documentation, mentoring, and getting new members productive quickly.

Collaboration.name: Ownership
Collaboration.description: Clear ownership and responsibility for different parts of the system. Ensures accountability and proper maintenance of system components.

Collaboration.name: Knowledge Sharing
Collaboration.description: Practices and culture around sharing technical knowledge within the team. Includes documentation, presentations, pair programming, and mentoring.

Collaboration.name: UX Dependencies
Collaboration.description: Management of dependencies and collaboration with UX/UI teams. Ensures smooth integration of design and development work.

Collaboration.name: Other Teams
Collaboration.description: Effectiveness of collaboration with other technical teams. Includes communication, dependency management, and cross-team project coordination.

Collaboration.name: DevEx
Collaboration.description: Developer Experience quality, including development environment, tools, and processes. Focuses on making developers productive and removing friction.

Collaboration.name: Decision Making
Collaboration.description: Quality and efficiency of technical decision-making processes. Includes architecture decisions, technology choices, and technical strategy.

Innovation.name: Technology
Innovation.description: Adoption and effective use of new technologies. Includes evaluation of new tools, frameworks, and platforms to improve development capabilities.

Innovation.name: Experiment
Innovation.description: Culture and practices around experimentation with new approaches and technologies. Includes prototyping, proof of concepts, and innovation initiatives.

Innovation.name: Learning & Development
Innovation.description: Investment in team learning and skill development. Includes training, conferences, workshops, and continuous learning opportunities.

Innovation.name: Tools
Innovation.description: Selection, implementation, and optimization of development tools and platforms. Focuses on improving team productivity through better tooling.
